outputs.output_descr: To improve coordination structures and mechanisms for three Rio Conventions (UNFCCC, UNCBD and UNCCD) through establishment and functioning of Ghana Environmental Conventions Coordinating Authority (GECCA) and its Secretariat.

project_descr: PIMS 3710 Ghana_MFA CB2: Establishing an Effective and Sustainable Structure for Implementing Multilateral Environmental Agreements
project_title: PIMS 3710 Ghana_MFA CB2:Coord. Authority for Conventions
